content: together knit the next stitch pass the two slipped stitches over the knitted stitch the pattern can also be worked in a more varied palette to use up any scraps you have hanging around keep the knitting quite loose for a soft flexible fabric i spliced yarn ends at color changes see phototutorial on page 6 to make a longer or shorter scarf you can make adjustments between row 125 and 193 adding or subtracting row as desired the scarf in the pictures was not blocked co and set up row 195 k3 k2tog x 2 k5 increase k5 ssk x 2 sl3 23sts co a few stitches using the backwards loop method row 197 199 201 203 205 207 209 211 213 215 217 219 only one of the stitches will be used the others will be dropped k3 k2tog k6 increase k6 ssk sl3 and left to unravel turn and make a 1 - 7 stitch increase into the row 221 k3 k2tog x 2 k4 increase k4 ssk x 2 sl3 21sts stitch nearest the tip of the needle drop the unused co stitches row 223 225 227 229 231 233 235 237 239 241 turn again and work set-up row k4 sl3wyif 7sts k3 k2tog k5 increase k5 ssk sl3 next row rs k3 1 - 5 stitch increase sl3wyif 11sts row 243 k3 k2tog x 2 k3 increase k3 ssk x 2 sl3 19sts next row and all ws row k to last 3sts sl3wyif row 245 247 249 251 253 255 257 k3 k2tog k4 increase k4 ssk sl3 for the rest of the pattern sl3wyif is abbreviated to sl3 row 259 k3 k2tog x 2 k2 increase k2 ssk x 2 sl3 17sts row 1 3 5 7 9 k3 k2tog increase ssk sl3 11sts row 261 263 265 267 269 271 273 k3 k2tog k3 increase k3 ssk sl3 row 11 k3 k2tog 1 - 5 increase ssk sl3 13sts row 275 k3 k2tog x 2 k1 increase k1 ssk x 2 sl3 15sts row 13 15 17 19 21 23 25 k3 k2tog k1 increase k1 ssk sl3 row 277 279 281 283 285 287 289 k3 k2tog k2 increase k2 ssk sl3 row 27 k3 k2tog kfb increase kfb ssk sl3 15sts row 291 k3 k2tog x 2 increase ssk x 2 sl3 13sts row 29 31 33 35 37 39 41 k3 k2tog k2 increase k2 ssk sl3 row 293 295 297 299 301 303 305 k3 k2tog k1 increase k1 ssk sl3 row 43 k3 k2tog k1 kfb increase kfb k1 ssk sl3 17sts row 307 k3 k2tog k3 ssk sl3 11sts row 45 47 49 51 53 55 57 k3 k2tog k3 increase k3 ssk sl3 row 309 311 313 k8 sl3 row 59 k3 k2tog k2 kfb increase kfb k2 ssk sl3 19sts row 315 k3 k2tog k1 ssk sl3 9sts row 61 63 65 67 69 71 73 k3 k2tog k4 increase k4 ssk sl3
